title: .exe has stopped working.
body:
Consistently getting this problem with patch 6.21.
Never has happened before this and I've uninstalled a good 20 or so times just to get lucky once when it fixes itself.
Is there going to be a fix for this or am I going to just have to deal with it?

replies.body:
Hmm.. this may be caused by League lacking specific admin rights it needs to run correctly. I'd recommend working through our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to ensure you've configured League to run with the privileges it needs. 

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
